name: Rat Heist [Alpha 4.4]
description:
In Rat Heist, you play as a witch who has been turned into a rat by her rival! Can you run, jump, and sneak your way to find the spellbook that will turn you human again? 

This is an alpha version of Rat Heist, an undergrad Capstone project being developed by a team of students in the Entertainment Arts and Engineering (EAE) program at the University of Utah.

Producers
Brayden Perez, James Houchins, and Riley Rood

Artists
Jay Fontenot, Cameron Cary, Daniel Chan, Phoebe Lineberry, Jordan Tolbert, Elena Southworth, Angel Butanda, Bo Zhang, Kaili Yan, Emilie Wolfe, Jason Chang, Xuanhao Mei, and Kamran Vahdati

Engineers
Anthony Palerino, Devin White, Grant Chang, Jackson Curtis, Jiayu Luo, Jonathan Adams, and Ray Parker

Designers
Garry Stein, Morgan Hanephin, Hanting Jiao, and Arjun Shivakumar
